summary.span: 使用 GZip 数据格式规范提供用于压缩和解压缩流的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to compress and decompress streams by using the GZip data format specification.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您想要指定压缩效率或速度对于类的实例是否更重要时，可以使用此构造函数 。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class. 此构造函数重载使用压缩模式 。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要将压缩模式设置为另一个值，请使用 或 重载。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建对象时设置压缩级别 。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/vb/program1.vb#1)]

param.name: stream
param.span: 压缩或解压缩后的数据被写入的流。

span.span: The stream the compressed or decompressed data is written to.

param.name: mode
param.span: 指示是要压缩还是解压缩流的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to compress or decompress the stream.

summary.span: 用指定的流和压缩模式初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 拥有基础流，因此关闭 `stream` 参数也会关闭基础流。By default, owns the underlying stream, so closing the `stream` parameter also closes the underlying stream. 请注意，基础流的状态可能会影响流的可用性。Note that the state of the underlying stream can affect the usability of the stream. 此外，不执行显式检查，因此在创建新实例时不会引发其他异常。Also, no explicit checks are performed, so no additional exceptions are thrown when the new instance is created. 如果创建类的实例 时使用的 `mode` 参数等于 `Compress` ，并且不执行其他操作，则流将显示为有效的空压缩文件。If an instance of the class is created with the `mode` parameter equal to `Compress` and no further action occurs, the stream will appear as a valid, empty compressed file. 默认情况下，压缩模式为时设置为的压缩级别 。By default, the compression level is set to when the compression mode is . ## Examples 下面的示例 通过 `mode` 将设置为来初始化类的新实例 。The following example initializes a new instance of the class with `mode` set to . 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/CS/gziptest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/VB/gziptest.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定压缩效率或速度对于类的实例是否更重要 ，以及在释放对象后是否将流对象保持打开状态，请使用此构造函数 。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class, and whether to leave the stream object open after disposing the object. 此构造函数重载使用压缩模式 。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要将压缩模式设置为另一个值，请使用 或 重载。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建对象时设置压缩级别 ，以及如何使流保持打开状态。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object and how to leave the stream open. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/vb/program2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 .NET Framework 4.5 开始，可以使用方法执行异步写入操作 。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5, you can perform asynchronous write operations by using the method. .NET Framework 4.5 中仍提供了方法来支持旧代码，但你可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。The method is still available in .NET Framework 4.5 to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](/dotnet/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o)。For more information, see [Asynchronous File I/O](/dotnet/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o). 方法对流对象启动异步写入操作 。The method starts an asynchronous write operation to a stream object. 您必须创建一个实现委托的回调方法 ，并将其名称传递给 方法。You must create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method.

span.span: The underlying stream is .
-or-

override this.CopyTo : System.IO.Stream * int -> unit

param.name: destination
param.span: 向其中复制当前 GZip 流的内容的流。

span.span: The stream to which the contents of the current GZip stream will be copied.

param.name: bufferSize
param.span: 缓冲区的大小。

span.span: The size of the buffer.

param.span: 此值必须大于零。

span.span: This value must be greater than zero.

param.span: 默认大小为 81920。

span.span: The default size is 81920.

summary.span: 使用指定的缓冲区大小，从当前 GZip 流中读取字节并将其写入到另一流中。

span.span: Reads the bytes from the current GZip stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从当前的 GZip 流中的当前位置开始复制，在复制操作完成后，不会重置目标流的位置。Copying begins at the current position in the current GZip stream, and does not reset the position of the destination stream after the copy operation is complete.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task CopyToAsync (System.IO.Stream destination, int bufferSize, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task CopyToAsync(class System.IO.Stream destination, int32 bufferSize, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

param.name: destination
param.span: 向其中复制当前 GZip 流的内容的流。

span.span: The stream to which the contents of the current GZip stream will be copied.

param.name: bufferSize
param.span: 缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the buffer.

param.span: 此值必须大于零。

span.span: This value must be greater than zero.

param.span: 默认大小为 81920。

span.span: The default size is 81920.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 要监视取消请求的标记。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

param.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 使用指定的缓冲区大小，从当前 GZip 流中异步读取字节并将其写入到另一流中。

span.span: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the current GZip stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size.

returns.span: 表示异步复制操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务包含 属性的值 。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property. 从当前的 GZip 流中的当前位置开始复制。Copying begins at the current position in the current GZip stream.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护的 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged).

summary.span: 异步释放 使用的非托管资源。

span.span: Asynchronously releases the unmanaged resources used by the .

returns.span: 一个表示异步释放操作的任务。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `DisposeAsync` 方法，可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的释放操作。The `DisposeAsync` method enables you to perform a resource-intensive dispose operation without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 此方法通过将任何更改写入后备存储并关闭流以释放资源来释放 GZip 流。This method disposes the GZip stream by writing any changes to the backing store and closing the stream to release resources. 调用 `DisposeAsync` 会允许出于其他目的重新分配所使用的资源 。Calling `DisposeAsync` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 .NET Framework 4.5 开始，可以使用方法执行异步读取操作 。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5, you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. .NET Framework 4.5 中仍提供了方法来支持旧代码，但你可以使用新的异步方法更轻松地实现异步 i/o 操作。The method is still available in .NET Framework 4.5 to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[异步文件 I/O](/dotnet/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o)。For more information, see [Asynchronous File I/O](/dotnet/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o). 调用此方法以确定从流中读取的字节数。Call this method to determine how many bytes were read from the stream. 可以调用此方法一次，以返回对和的调用之间的读取字节量 。This method can be called once to return the amount of bytes read between calls to and . 此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类压缩和解压缩文件。The following code example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a file. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/CS/gziptest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/VB/gziptest.vb#1)]

span.span: The end operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (Span<byte> buffer);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read(valuetype System.Span`1<unsigned int8> buffer) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Span(Of Byte)) As Integer
public: override int Read(Span<System::Byte> buffer);
override this.Read : Span<byte> -> int

param.name: buffer
param.span: 内存的区域。

span.span: A region of memory.

param.span: 当此方法返回时，此区域的内容将替换为从当前源读取的字节。

span.span: When this method returns, the contents of this region are replaced by the bytes read from the current source.

summary.span: 将当前 GZip 流中的一个字节序列读取到某字节范围，并按读取的字节数向前移动 GZip 流中的位置。

span.span: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current GZip stream into a byte span and advances the position within the GZip stream by the number of bytes read.

returns.span: 读入缓冲区中的总字节数。

span.span: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果很多字节当前不可用，则这可小于在缓冲区中分配的字节数；如果已到达流结尾，则为零 (0)。

span.span: This can be less than the number of bytes allocated in the buffer if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 使用 方法从当前流中异步读取。Use the method to read asynchronously from the current stream. 此方法从当前流中读取最多 `buffer.Length` 字节，并将它们存储在中 `buffer` 。This method read a maximum of `buffer.Length` bytes from the current stream and store them in `buffer`. GZip 流中的当前位置由读取的字节数提前;但是，如果发生异常，则 GZip 流中的当前位置将保持不变。The current position within the GZip stream is advanced by the number of bytes read; however, if an exception occurs, the current position within the GZip stream remains unchanged. 如果没有数据可用，则此方法将被阻止，直到至少有一个字节的数据可供读取。This method will block until at least one byte of data can be read, in the event that no data is available. `Read` 仅当流中没有更多的数据，但不需要更多的数据时，才会返回0， (例如关闭的套接字或文件末尾) 。`Read` returns 0 only when there is no more data in the stream and no more is expected (such as a closed socket or end of file). 即使尚未到达流的末尾，方法也可以随意返回比所请求的字节更少的字节。The method is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached. 用于 读取基元数据类型。Use for reading primitive data types.

span.span: If the end of the stream has been reached, zero or the number of bytes read is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果发现数据的格式无效， 则会作为最后一个操作的一个引发。If data is found in an invalid format, an is thrown as one of the last operations. 循环冗余检查 (CRC) 作为此方法的最后一项操作执行。A cyclic redundancy check (CRC) is performed as one of the last operations of this method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用和方法压缩和解压缩字节 。The following example shows how to compress and decompress bytes by using the and methods. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/vb/program3.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReadAsync`方法使你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `ReadAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务包含 属性的值 。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReadAsync`方法使你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `ReadAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务包含 属性的值 。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

summary.span: 从 GZip 流中读取一个字节，并将流内的位置向前提升一个字节，或者如果已到达 GZip 流结尾，则返回 -1。

span.span: Reads a byte from the GZip stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte, or returns -1 if at the end of the GZip stream.

returns.span: 强制转换为 的无符号字节，如果到达流的末尾，则为 -1。

span.span: The unsigned byte cast to an , or -1 if at the end of the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Write (ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> buffer) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Write (buffer As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte))
public: override void Write(ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> buffer);
override this.Write : ReadOnlySpan<byte> -> unit

param.name: buffer
param.span: 内存的区域。

span.span: A region of memory.

param.span: 此方法将此区域的内容复制到当前 GZip 流。

span.span: This method copies the contents of this region to the current GZip stream.

summary.span: 从一个只读字节范围将字节的序列写入当前 GZip 流，并按写入的字节数向前移动此 GZip 流中的当前位置。

span.span: Writes a sequence of bytes to the current GZip stream from a read-only byte span and advances the current position within this GZip stream by the number of bytes written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 使用 方法异步写入当前流。Use the method to write asynchronously to the current stream. 如果写入操作成功，则 GZip 流中的位置将按写入的字节数向前移动。If the write operation is successful, the position within the GZip stream advances by the number of bytes written. 如果发生异常，则 GZip 流中的位置将保持不变。If an exception occurs, the position within the GZip stream remains unchanged.

override this.Write : byte[] * int * int -> unit

param.name: array
param.span: 包含要压缩的数据的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer that contains the data to compress.

param.name: offset
param.span: 中的字节偏移量，将在此处读取字节。

span.span: The byte offset in from which the bytes will be read.

param.name: count
param.span: 最多写入的字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to write.

summary.span: 从指定的字节数组中将压缩的字节写入基础 GZip 流。

span.span: Writes compressed bytes to the underlying GZip stream from the specified byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 写操作可能不会立即发生，而是在达到缓冲区大小时或 调用或方法之前缓冲 。The write operation might not occur immediately but is buffered until the buffer size is reached or until the or method is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用和方法压缩和解压缩字节 。The following example shows how to compress and decompress bytes by using the and methods. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/vb/program3.vb#3)]

exception.span: 由于流已关闭，因此无法执行写入操作。

span.span: The write operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask WriteAsync (ReadOnlyMemory<byte> buffer, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask WriteAsync(valuetype System.ReadOnlyMemory`1<unsigned int8> buffer, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Overrides Function WriteAsync (buffer As ReadOnlyMemory(Of Byte), Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As ValueTask
override this.WriteAsync : ReadOnlyMemory<byte> * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask

param.name: buffer
param.span: 从中写入数据的内存区域。

span.span: The region of memory to write data from.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 要监视取消请求的标记。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

param.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 从指定的只读字节内存区域中，将压缩的字节异步写入基础 GZip 流。

span.span: Asynchronously writes compressed bytes to the underlying GZip stream from the specified read-only byte memory region.

returns.span: 表示异步写入操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteAsync`方法使你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `WriteAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务包含 属性的值 。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task WriteAsync (byte[] array, int offset, int count, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

span.span: The buffer that contains the data to compress.

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in from which to begin copying bytes to the GZip stream.

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

param.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

summary.span: 从指定的字节数组中将压缩的字节异步写入基础 GZip 流。

span.span: Asynchronously writes compressed bytes to the underlying GZip stream from the specified byte array.

returns.span: 表示异步写入操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteAsync`方法使你可以在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 i/o 操作。The `WriteAsync` method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread. 在 Windows 8.x 应用商店应用或桌面应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。This performance consideration is particularly important in a Windows 8.x Store app or desktop app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working. 异步方法与 `async` `await` Visual Basic 和 c # 中的和关键字结合使用。The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#. 使用 属性可确定当前实例是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 如果在操作完成前取消该操作，则返回的任务包含 属性的值 。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property.
